commodities.dataaccess.dataloader
Class PriceFormatter

java.lang.Object
  commodities.dataaccess.dataloader.PriceFormatter
public class PriceFormatter
extends Object

The PriceFormatter class converts standardly formatted prices to the appropriate decimal price for storage into the database.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

Determines the format of the price for the given commodity symbol and returns the appropriately formatted price.
